ygData.subject: Re: Wizards (Useless?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Why dont we make a petition here on the list that we all can stand for and then evryone copy and paste it in a mail to Verant ? that way it will be exactly the
ygData.messageBody:
Why dont we make a petition here on the list that we all can stand for and then evryone copy and paste it in a mail to Verant ? that way it will be exactly the same and they know that we all stand for it !!!



Askur Gnome Wizard on Veeshan


-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Fr�n: Wizard <wizard@...>
Till: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Datum: den 26 maj 1999 18:46
�mne: Re: [eq_wizards] Wizards (Useless?)


>From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
>Before petition we must see what for to petition i send some things to
>eqmail@... but it will be important if majority of us send same things.
>
>
>At 08.08 26/05/99 -0700, you wrote:
>>From: "Tyson Schoepflin" <schoty@...>
>>
>>I have a 21st lvl wizard. I can log in and spend 20 - 40 mins trying to
>>find a group to play with. But no one
>>ever wants a wizard. About the only time I can get in a group is if my
>>friends that I know in real life are on.
>>Which isn't every time I play. How am I to lvl up and play the game, if this
>>is a grouping game as they (verant)
>>say, when I can't find anyone to group with?
>>
>>As far as I can tell the wizard is pretty much useless and I have put him on
>>the side because I can't solo (tried
>>many a time) and I can't find a party that wants me.
>>
>>I have a bard, necro, and SK as other chars and find groups all the time
>>with no problem. Either we need to
>>start a petition or wizard will just continue to pretty much suck.
>>
>>Venlaan - Mith. Marr
>>
>>
>>
